February 2004 Tips & Tricks has a MR4 Rare Monster Guide!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): February 2004 Tips & Tricks has a MR4 Rare Monster Guide!
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, January 18, 2004 - 06:13 pm:

I just got the February 2004 Tips & Tricks, and there's a nice 4-page color spread on the rare monsters in MR4, along with their pics, and the discs that make them. The article doesn't show all the rares. Four of the rares we have not found yet are also missing.

The T&T people also used Suezo for a subscriber ad and tear out subscription card.
